# Options

General options shared with all strategies. See defaults.js for defaults.

# apiKey

Default: uuid key

The uuid key is generated using uuid-apikey module

# rootFolder

Default: cache

The root folder used to store resources

# rootUrl

Default: xhr-cache

The prefix url used by exposed resources

# maxAge

Default: 3600 * 1000

Specifies the number (in milliseconds) until the resource is refreshed from his external resource

# clean

Default: true

Clean all resources located in rootFolder rootFolder on nuxt start

# resources

Default: [] Resource

Specify all resources to be used

  • # resource

Example:

{
  name: 'resource-name',
  init: false,
  request: {
    // Axios request https://github.com/axios/axios#request-config
  }
}

  • # name - Name of the resource

  • # maxAge - Number (in milliseconds) until the resource is refreshed default (maxAge)[./options.md#maxage]

  • # init - Fetch resource at nuxt start

    • Boolean: false to not fetch at nuxt start, true to call request method
    • Function: ( { store }) => Promise
    ({ store }) => {
  const ctx = { storeId: 'REF' }
  const path = `categories/categories-${ctx.storeId}.json`

  return store({ path, ctx, identifier: ctx.storeId })
}

  • # request - Axios XHR request

({ storeId }) => ({
    method: 'get',
    url: 'api/v1/categories',
    params: {
      storeId
    }
  })

  • # catch - Value used if request error or no content returned
